vogar.target

Class MainRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.target.MainRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runner

    public final class MainRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Runner
    Runs a Java class with a main method. This includes jtreg tests.
